data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Xiangtan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xiangtan, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Xiangtan words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next week in Xiangtan, Hunan, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Xiangtan, Hunan, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,045,300 people living in Xiangtan, Hunan, China. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Han Chinese, Xiang people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Han Chinese, Xiang people know you.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,045,300 people living in the county of Xiangtan.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Xiangtan to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, of the 16,887 people in the county of Xiangtan who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
